metadata.title: Bread Upma | Easy Breakfast | South Indian Recipe
metadata.description:
Bread stir fried with veggies and seasonings- great for breakfast or as an evening snack.
ðŸ‘‰Recipe: https://bit.ly/3CjRMcx

transcription: [00:00.000] Heat oil in a pan on medium flame.
[00:10.000] Add mustard seeds and let them splutter.
[00:20.000] Add curry leaves, chopped green chilies, ginger and garlic. Saute for a minute.
[00:30.000] Add chopped onions and saute till they turn translucent.
[00:40.000] Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric powder, coriander powder and salt. Cook until tomatoes soften.
[00:50.000] Add chopped vegetables like carrot, capsicum and green peas. Saute for 2 minutes.
[01:00.000] Break bread slices into small pieces and add to the pan. Mix well with the vegetables and masala.
[01:10.000] Cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally so that the bread absorbs the flavors.
[01:20.000] Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve hot for breakfast or as a snack.
[01:30.000] Enjoy your delicious South Indian style Bread Upma!
